details.text: The xhtml has some language sections (de, pt), but language sections are prohibited in this context by the profile StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org.au/fhir/test/StructureDefinition/xhtml-ctrol-source-profile]
Resource has a language (en), and the XHTML has a lang (pt), but they differ
Resource has a language (en), and the XHTML has an xml:lang (pt), but they differ
